content: this colorful tubular cowl is knit in the round using stranded colorwork throughout finished by grafting the ends together with an optional twist experience level * intermediate materials * woolstok worsted bundle 100% fine highland wool 27 mini hanks 5g/12yds each 1 bundle 27 color * size 7 4 5mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge * size h-8 5 0mm hook for crochet provisional co * scrap yarn for crochet provisional co * stitch holder s or waste yarn * spare needle to hold sts for grafting * stitch marker * tapestry needle finished measurements * width flat 7¾ * length before grafting 23¾ colors shown * 27 color bundle all 27 colors of woolstok worsted notes * check gauge frequently
